fsrtool.name: fsrtool_user_alts
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_user_alts` ( `charID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `mainCharID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `charName` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `userID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `userAPI` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `accessMask` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `corpID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `pos` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `pos_edit` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `silo` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `newAPI` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`charID`,`mainCharID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
